value.stringValue: {!myVariable_current.Owner:User.FirstName} {!myVariable_current.Owner:User.LastName} has updated comments to task {!myVariable_current.Subject} regarding {!myVariable_current.Notification_Related_To__c}.

{!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.LastName} has updated comments to task {!myVariable_current.Subject} regarding {!myVariable_current.Notification_Related_To__c}.

{!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.LastName} has moved task {!myVariable_current.Subject} regarding {!myVariable_current.Notification_Related_To__c} to "In Review" status.

{!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.LastName} has moved task {!myVariable_current.Subject} regarding {!myVariable_current.Notification_Related_To__c} from "In Review" status to "{!myVariable_current.Status}".

rules.name: myRule_17
rules.label: Update Criteria to Send Time Elapsed Emails

value.stringValue:
AND( TEXT(PRIORVALUE([Task].Status )) == "In Review",
OR( ISPICKVAL([Task].Status , "Open"),ISPICKVAL([Task].Status , "Completed") )
, NOT([Task].LastModifiedBy.Id ==[Task].OwnerId ) )
an unspecified collaboration or an Issue
